page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN GULVAL
page.content: Many Gulval people work in Penzance, being the nearest town. Employment in the area includes farmers and farm workers, railway workers at the British Rail Depot, school staff, heliport staff, and people working in shops and garages. The Long Rock Industrial site has {light industry.}It includes a British Telecom factory and a group of small workshops for hire to small companies or individuals. {Tourism}brings seasonal employment to the area. Marazion has hotels, guest houses, bed and breakfast facilities and cafes. The caravan and camping site and Kennegy Hotel Complex also provide jobs. As in the rest of Cornwall, the number of{unemployed people}who are unable to find jobs is very worrying.
